类 EquipmentController

java.lang.Object
com.milotnt.controller.EquipmentController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/equipment") public class EquipmentController extends Object
类名：EquipmentController 说明：器材控制器类，用于处理与"equipment"相关的请求
